posts.content:
safari guru

We know you make safari windows, but I don't think you need to keep pushing it on every thread.

This is a free forum where traders are able to post, however we prefer them to offer advice and comment and not just a hard sell.

Sponsor a topic on VZi if you want to hard sell.

Thanks
Richard

safari guru wrote:if you want to hack safari windows into the earliest barndoor on the road in the UK then i make a kit thats just like the o.g. safaris........ even though they weren't available in november 1950. there in the parts section of this forum and on the samba under t2 parts 49-67. Please excuse my hard sell, lack of knowledge, and poor grammar


Wow

safari guru wrote:if you want to put safari windows in that 50 i make a kit thats just like the o.g. safaris. there in the parts section of this forum and on the samba under t2 parts 49-67


Not everybody in the UK want to brake out the drill and put safaris in there BarNdoors people will find your kits if they want to buy them

Come for a ride in the '50


http://youtu.be/v4TOlKhnlPc

busben wrote:
safari guru wrote:if you want to hack safari windows into the earliest barndoor on the road in the UK then i make a kit thats just like the o.g. safaris........ even though they weren't available in november 1950. there in the parts section of this forum and on the samba under t2 parts 49-67. Please excuse my hard sell, lack of knowledge, and poor grammar


Wow

the only thing that has been hacked is my user name and pass word on this site. i did not post that and i do not know what kind of bored lonely individual needs to pose as someone else and make bogus statements but there is some imposter on this forum doing just that.
i did visit a few threads to let people know about my kits and was informed by menace that that is not cool. i agree and am sorry if i hurt any body's feelings.
the part about poor grammar may be true but i am an American what else would you guys expect. us yanks invented poor grammar.

Wow

i did visit a few threads to let people know about my kits and was informed by menace that that is not cool. i agree and am sorry if i hurt any body's feelings.
the part about poor grammar may be true but i am an American what else would you guys expect. us yanks invented poor grammar.

.
Back on track, took the 50 out for breakfast Yesterday, managed to persuade Tom to finish building his 58 in return for a free fry up, it appears he will do anything for free food!
Who wouldn't do anything for a free breakfast! Was good to get out in the bus and see it parked up with the 50!
Trans swap time on the old bus, out it all comes...
